text:
Mart Crowley (August 21, 1935 – March 7, 2020) was an American playwright. He was best known for his play "The Boys in the Band". Crowley's sequel to "The Boys in the Band" was entitled "The Men from the Boys". He was born in Vicksburg, Mississippi.
Crowley died in Manhattan on March 7, 2020 from a heart attack caused by surgery at the age of 84.
